title: Piazza, Pedro, Chipper and ‚ÄòThor‚Äô post celebratory tweets for Mets
text:
Past Mets, other famous New Yorkers and even Thor took to Twitter after the Mets‚Äô thrilling 3-2 NLDS-clinching victory over the Dodgers on Thursday night. Here‚Äôs a sampling: 
Thought it was an amazing game and series. Was on the edge of my seat all night, Congrats @Mets , enjoy tonight, keep going! #LetsGoMets 
‚Äî Mike Piazza (@mikepiazza31) October 16, 2015 
Degrom, you earned the title tonight! You are my daddy!! pic.twitter.com/sCDsFqE68v

Congratulations to the @Mets who showed unreal guts through thick and thin all year on reaching the #NLCS #Mets #LGM

Congrats to @JdeGrom19 and the @Mets . Great series! Cubs vs. Mets in LCS. Power pitching galore. Should be a goodun!
